  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (!window.console) { window.console = {};  window.console.log = function () {};}
// Hack for bad google ad
var adTimer = window.setInterval(resizeGoogleAd, 1000);
window.timesChecked = 0;
function resizeGoogleAd(){
	var adDiv = document.getElementById('creative_57777181_0');
	if(typeof adDiv !== 'undefined' &amp;&amp; adDiv !== null){
		adDiv.style.width = '';
		adDiv.style.height = '';
		var adDivChild = adDiv.firstChild;
		adDivChild.style.width = '';
		adDivChild.style.height = '';
		var nextChild = adDivChild.firstChild;
		nextChild.style.position = '';
		window.clearInterval(adTimer);
		return;
	}
	if(timesChecked &gt;= 4){
		window.clearInterval(adTimer);
		return;
	}
}
  </script>

   var CS_segments = ''; 
CS_segments = __ZDDMP.GetAdString() +function () { 
    var key='special';
    var sp=decodeURIComponent((new RegExp('[?|&amp;]' + key + '=' + '([^&amp;;]+?)(&amp;|#|;|$)').exec(location.search)||[,""])[1].replace(/\+/g, '%20'))||null;
    return (sp==null?'':';'+key+'='+sp);
}();
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var __GEEK = __GEEK || {};
    __GEEK.parseQuerystring = __GEEK.parseQuerystring || function (url) {
	   var q = {};
	   if (!url) {
		 return {};
	   }
	    url.replace(/([^?=&amp;]+)(=([^&amp;]*))?/g, function ($0, $1, $2, $3) { q[$1] = $3; });
	    return q;
  };
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">

	__GEEK.detectOOFChange();
     })();
     var querystring = __GEEK.parseQuerystring(window.location.href);
     var extraKeys =  (window["CS_segments"] ? CS_segments : '') + (window["extraAdValues"] ? ';' + extraAdValues : '') + "";

	__GEEK.OOF = __GEEK.detectOOF();
     }
     googletag.cmd.push(function() {
	     	
	   var adSlot = googletag.defineSlot('/4585/zd.geek/gamessection_ATF',[[970,250], [728,90]], 'TopBanner');

		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);

			    var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			    adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
			}
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {

		   }
		   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
	   __GEEK.currentAds.push({

			    var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			    adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
			}
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   }
		   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
	   __GEEK.currentAds.push({ 
	    divId: 'TopMpu', 
	    slot: adSlot, 
			adSize: [[300,250], [300,600],[300,1050]],
			adUnit:'/4585/zd.geek/gamessection_ATF',
			adZdid:'1501113'
	    });
		
	   var adSlot = googletag.defineSlot('/4585/zd.geek/gamessection_BTF',[[300,250], [300,600],[300,1050]], 'BottomMpu');
		   adSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		   adSlot.setTargeting("zdid", "1501113" );
		   adSlot.setTargeting("cmn","zd");
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);
		   adSlot.setTargeting("template", "article" );
		   for(var i = 0; i &lt; extraKeysArray.length; i++) {
			if (extraKeysArray[i].length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; extraKeysArray[i].indexOf("=") &gt; -1) {
			    var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			    adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
			}
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   }
		   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
	   __GEEK.currentAds.push({ 
	    divId: 'BottomMpu', 
	    slot: adSlot, 
			adSize: [[300,250], [300,600],[300,1050]],
			adUnit:'/4585/zd.geek/gamessection_BTF',
			adZdid:'1501113'
	    });
			   var adSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot('/4585/zd.geek/gamessection', 'StitialAds');
		   adSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		   adSlot.setTargeting("zdid", "1501113" );
		   adSlot.setTargeting("cmn","zd");
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);		   
		   adSlot.setTargeting("template", "article" );
		   for(var i = 0; i &lt; extraKeysArray.length; i++) {
		    if (extraKeysArray[i].length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; extraKeysArray[i].indexOf("=") &gt; -1) {
			var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
		    }
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   } 
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOP_type", 'stitials');
		   if(querystring.special){
		adSlot.setTargeting("special", querystring.special);
	   }
	   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
				   var adSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot('/4585/zd.geek/gamessection', 'SpecialAds');
		   adSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		   adSlot.setTargeting("zdid", "1501113" );
		   adSlot.setTargeting("cmn","zd");
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);		   
		   adSlot.setTargeting("template", "article" );
		   for(var i = 0; i &lt; extraKeysArray.length; i++) {
		    if (extraKeysArray[i].length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; extraKeysArray[i].indexOf("=") &gt; -1) {
			var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
		    }
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   } 
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOP_type", 'skin');
		   if(querystring.special){
		adSlot.setTargeting("special", querystring.special);
	   }
	   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
				   googletag.enableServices();
		});
	var _gaq = _gaq || [];
	_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 2 , 'template', 'article', 3 ]);
	_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 3 , 'OOF', __GEEK.OOF, 3 ]);
	_gaq.push(["_trackPageview"]);
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.ZDVOptions = {
  onViewed: function(ad) {
  if (ad.containerId === "TopBanner") {
      if ((ad.size === "728x90" || ad.size === "970x250") ){
         __GEEKSTICKY.Unsticky();
         console.log("banner ad is released");
      }
    }
   if (ad.containerId === "TopMpu") {
      if ((ad.size === "300x250" || ad.size === "300x600") ){
         __GEEKSTICKY.UnstickyMedrect();
         console.log("** Medrect ad is released");
      }
    }
  }
}

         <aside class="widget widget_more_posts_by_category" id="more_posts_by_category-2">
          <h3 class="widget-title">
           More Geek
          </h3>
          <div class="moreongeek">
           <article>
            <figure>

		   &lt;script type="text/javascript"&gt;
			googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('StitialAds'); });
           </script>
           <noscript>
            <a href="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/jump?iu=/4585/zd.geek/gamessection&amp;t=zdid%3D1501113%26cmn%3Dzd&amp;sz=x&amp;template=article&amp;c=3098448&amp;tile=4">
             <img src="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ad?iu=/4585/zd.geek/gamessection&amp;t=zdid%3D1501113%26cmn%3Dzd&amp;sz=x&amp;template=article&amp;c=3098448&amp;tile=4"/>

           <noscript>
            <a href="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/jump?iu=/4585/zd.geek/gamessection&amp;t=zdid%3D1501113%26cmn%3Dzd&amp;sz=x&amp;template=article&amp;c=1325144&amp;tile=5">
             <img src="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ad?iu=/4585/zd.geek/gamessection&amp;t=zdid%3D1501113%26cmn%3Dzd&amp;sz=x&amp;template=article&amp;c=1325144&amp;tile=5"/>
            </a>
           </noscript>
          </div>
         </aside>
         <div id="adcontainer2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- Bottom Sidebar -->
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="rightpanel">
       <div class="articleinfo">
        <div class="category">
         <span class="red">
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/category/games/">
           Games
          </a>
         </span>
         <span>
          By
          <span class="by">
           <a href="http://www.geek.com/author/Matthew-2/" rel="author" title="Posts by Matthew Humphries">
            Matthew Humphries
           </a>
          </span>
          Jul. 4, 2012 8:27 am
         </span>
        </div>
        <figure>
         <img alt="Ouya" class="attachment-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" height="378" src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Ouya-590x378.jpg" width="590"/>
        </figure>
        <article>
         <p>
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Ouya.jpg">
          </a>
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/tagged/android">
           Android
          </a>
          is fast becoming the got-to operating system for new and varying devices. Its increasingly found on a range of tablets, smartphones, set-top boxes, and media players, but now it seems the Google-developed OS is making the leap into a games console, too.
         </p>
         <p>
          Very few details are known about the new device other than it will be called the Ouya, has a price point of $99, and all the games it offers will be free-to-play. Sounds good so far, but it gets better when you find out who is involved in the project.
         </p>
         <p>
          Ouya lists Yves Behar (
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/tagged/olpc">
           OLPC
          </a>
          designer), Ed Fries (former
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/tagged/xbox">
           Xbox
          </a>
          VP), Peter Pham (
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/mobile/color-a-new-photo-sharing-proximity-based-social-network-app-20110324">
           Color
          </a>
          app), Amol Sarva (
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/tagged/peek">
           Peek
          </a>
          email gadget), Muffi Ghadiali (Amazon
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/tagged/kindle">
           Kindle
          </a>
          ), and Julie Uhrman (IGN) as part of the team behind the machine.
         </p>
         <p>
          So the talent to ship a games console is in place, the price point is well below any other gaming device on the market, and the games will be free. That all bodes well for sales, but Ouya also doubles as a development kit, meaning anyone who spends the $99 to purchase one can also develop games for it.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/ouya_02.jpg">
           <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-1501119" height="326" src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/ouya_02-580x326.jpg" title="ouya_02" width="580"/>
          </a>
         </p>
         <p>
          Revenue will have to come from somewhere, and so advertising and in-game purchases are sure to play a big part. It also makes sense to have the Ouya double as a media streamer, meaning
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/tagged/netflix">
           Netflix
          </a>
          will no doubt get its service running, and theres sure to be a few music services signing up, too.
         </p>
         <p>
          All we need to know now is when Ouya is going to ship.
         </p>
         <p>
          via
          <a href="http://www.theverge.com/2012/7/2/3134004/ouya-a-99-hackable-android-game-console-designed-by-yves-behar">
           The Verge
          </a>
         </p>
         <div class="pagenationsearch">
          <p>
          </p>
         </div>
        </article>
        <aside class="widget widget_execphp" id="execphp-32">

         </script>
        </aside>

            * afterRender - fires when template is rendered but before we show it
            * onReady - everything is done
         */

   <script type="text/javascript">
    // &lt;![CDATA[
        var disqus_shortname = 'geekcom';
        (function () {
            var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
            for (var i = 0, url; i &lt; nodes.length; i++) {
                if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
                    nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('rel'));
                    url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
                    if (url.length == 1) url = url[0];
                    else url = url[1]
                    nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
                }
            }
            var s = document.createElement('script'); s.async = true;
            s.type = 'text/javascript';
            s.src = '//' + 'disqus.com/forums/' + disqus_shortname + '/count.js';
            (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
        }());

   </script>

   <!-- Tab Stuff -->
   <script type="text/javascript">
    window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
    _taboola.push({flush: true});
    
    var __ZDTABEVENT = {
        accountid : "",
        init : function(acct) {
            __ZDTABEVENT.accountid = acct;
            var divs = document.querySelectorAll("div[id^=taboola]"), i=divs.length;
            while (i--) {
                divs[i].addEventListener("click", __ZDTABEVENT.clkevt);
                __ZDTABEVENT.track(divs[i].id, "imp");
            }
        },
        clkevt : function(evt){
            __ZDTABEVENT.track(evt.currentTarget.id, "clk");


        },
        track : function(id,evt) {
            var el = document.getElementById(id);
            var placement = el.getAttribute('data-placement');
            var pagetype = el.getAttribute('data-page-type');
            if(window.ga) window.ga('send', 'event', 'Taboola', pagetype + '-' + placement, evt);
            if(window._gaq) window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Taboola', pagetype+'-'+placement, evt, undefined, true]);
            if (__ZDDMP) { __ZDDMP.Event({signal:'taboola', pubid: __ZDTABEVENT.accountid, ptype:pagetype, placement:placement, evt:evt});}
        }
    };
    __ZDTABEVENT.init('ziffdavis-network15-geek');
   </script>

&lt;!-- set in head --&gt;
_sf_async_config.sections = 'Gadgets'; 
_sf_async_config.authors ='Matthew Humphries';
/** CONFIGURATION END **/
(function(){
function loadChartbeat()
{ window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime(); var e = document.createElement('script'); e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript'); e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript'); e.setAttribute('src', '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js'); document.body.appendChild(e); }

loadChartbeat : function()
{ oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); }

})();

  setTimeout(function() {
  if (jQuery("#adsense").height() &lt; 8) { 
    if (window._gaq) { window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'AdBlocker','Blocked' ,undefined, undefined, true]); }
    if (window.ga) { window.ga('send', 'event', 'AdBlocker', 'Blocked'); }
  } else {
    if (window._gaq) { window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'AdBlocker','NotBlocked' ,undefined, undefined, true]); }

});
